abstract: PepsiCo plans to announce an exclusive deal to supply all nonalcoholic beverages in IHOP and Applebee’s restaurants, according to a note distributed Sunday to subscribers of a trade publication.
snippet: PepsiCo plans to announce an exclusive deal to supply all nonalcoholic beverages in IHOP and Applebee’s restaurants, according to a note distributed Sunday to subscribers of a trade publication.
lead_paragraph: The cola wars are heating up again.

headline.main: Report Says Pepsi in Deals With IHOP and Applebee’s
headline.print_headline: Report Says Pepsi in Deals With IHOP and Applebee’s
